jd: From: zaid, Panzer zaid.khan@panzersolutions.com Reply to: zaid.khan@panzersolutions.com Hi ,How are you doing well!My name is Zaid Khan, and I am a certified LinkedIn Recruiter currently working as a Talent Acquisition Specialist at Panzer Solutions LLC.
